rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I like it when it's nice an' peaceful.
Everyone should just pet Armoo
instead of fighting!

rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0002
rows.name:
They smell really nice like the
outdoors and you can sleep
super comfy on their back!

rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0003
rows.name:
No, really! Everyone needs to have
an Armoo!

rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Then Mor'dain an' Invidia'll stop
fighting an' everyone can be happy!

rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0005
rows.name:
They can just relax an' play with
th'Armoo aaaaall day long.
